Windows Laptops

.....Our unbeatable range of Windows Laptops includes the industry’s leading brands. Browse our range of Dell, HP, Lenovo, Microsoft, Samsung & PC Specialist laptops. Choosing the right Laptop for you can be difficult. We help you get it right – with advice on the ideal laptops for gaming, work, social and casual use, full spec details to compare laptops & our easy to use laptop buying guide.

Macbooks

Cutting edge design & functionality, Apple Macbooks have it all. Suitable for home and work use, Macbooks always deliver. Each Macbook released arrives with further innovation. We stock the full range, including Macbook Pro, Macbook Air and the ultra-thin Macbook.

Chromebooks

A new breed of innovative laptops with a wide appeal. Chromebooks run on Chrome OS and are specifically designed to use with cloud-based applications. Chromebooks are renowned for their affordability, high battery life and their inclination for web based apps over desktop applications.
